Posts.Content: Christos wrote: Hi everyone,This is the first time I have wrote or talked to strangers about my situation.  My mom was diagnosed with depression in 2003.  I took her to the hospital at least 20x in two years, depression, anxiety is what all the doctors told me.  I asked if my mother had cancer out of the blue one day, they thought i was crazy.  Well March 2006 I got this horrible news, they told my mom that they can't take the 7cm tumor in her breast out.  They gave her two years and the " quality of life".  She is still with me but Iam noticing changes very quickly.  I drive around and just cry and I don't know what I am going do with out her.  Next time you see or know someone that is constanly depressed think twice IT COULD WORSE.
